Name: Kicks Online
About the game: Kicks Online Freestyle Football Game is now available for free on Steam. It featured street soccer modes and rules 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, 4v4, and 5v5 matches, and unconventional fields like roofs, streets and factories. * LANGUAGES AVAILABLE * (English , Spanish , French , Italian , Chinese , Korean) * MODES AVAILABLE TO PLAY * 1vs1 2vs2 3vs3 4vs4 5vs5 * CLUBS SYSTEM * Players can create their own club or participate in one. Buy a primary and secondary uniforms and play on the Club Server which gives more experience than the normal server. * EARN MONEY PLAYING KICKS ONLINE * No tricks and fun guaranteed. Collect as much as Kicks Points and convert it for real money. Kicks Points are obtained by: 1. Opening random boxes 2. Getting it from the drop system 3. Completing special missions that can reward you kicks points 4. Participating in events in game and lottery in our web 5. Trying your luck and bet using the #betkickspoints command 6. Playing against other players using the #playforkickspoints command The Kicks Points can be converted for (USD) and you can withdraw it with among of a list of payments methods! * HOST SYSTEM * Matches are hosted on P2P mode , meaning that anyone can create their own room , we suggest to play with players from your same region to get a playable ping. * KICKS MARKET * This is a global web market where players can do the following: 1. Trade your Kicks Points and get real money ($5.00 USD) 2. Trade your Kicks Points and get special items (+15) with custom stats 3. Trade your Kicks Points and get it converted into NORMAL POINTS 4. Trade your Kicks Points and get it converted for special skills for your character 5. Trade your Kicks Points and get it converted into PERMANENT (Free Stat +1) 6. Trade your Kicks Points and get it converted into KASH 7. Exchange your characters with other players with all modes available (1x1 / 2x1 / 3x1) 8. BUY or SELL characters for USD Balance 9. BUY or SELL characters for Kicks Points 10. BUY or SELL characters for KASH At level 18 you choose your final position for your character, more information about positions can be found in our website: -online.net/en/general/positions * CUSTOMIZED GLOBAL RANKING * Each player in Kicks Online has it's own ranking # ID Filtered out by (Highest level - Tackles - Steals - Intercepts , Goals , Assists) -online.net/en/ranking/global * ITEMS SHOP * Players can buy clothes , items and abilities for their characters - more than 300 new items have been added for Female/Male characters. * AUTOMATIC REWARDS WHEN REACHING SPECIFIC LEVELS * Reaching level 25: Backpack +10 Agility for 30 days Reaching level 30: Muffler +10 Endurance for 30 days Reaching level 35: 1000 KASH automatically loaded to the account Reaching level 45: 10 Kicks Points automatically loaded to the account Reaching level 60: Permanent Item +15 with the option to select the stat (#selectprize) 10 FREE extra stats Permanent Legend Tag 3000 KASH Reward loaded to the accountâ€‹ For more information about the Kicks Online Server on real time: -online.net/en/servers * GOLDEN TIME * Golden time is an feature that when is enabled, players in-game receive more experience in all matches modes (1vs1,2vs2,3vs3,4vs4,5vs5) * MATCH LOG * Each match completed on Kicks Online is saved and logged on the Match Log Historial of the official website of Kicks Online: -online.net/en/match_log * COMMANDS AVAILABLE * #PROGRESS #REWARDS #PRIZES #SELECTPRIZE #GT #CT: #SENDKASH #SENDKPS #TEAMS #POINTS #TIMELEFT #WHO HOST #PLAYFORPOINTS #PLAYPORKASH #PLAYPORKPS #CANCEL #OBSERVER #BETSYSTEM #BETPOINTS #BETKASH #BETKPS #WARNINGS #MUTE #GM OFFICIAL WEBSITE: -online.net/ _________________________________ Discord Chat Kicks Online: WhatsApp Chat Kicks Online: Facebook Kicks Online: -online.net/facebook Twitter Kicks Online: -online.net/twitter Instagram Kicks Online: -online.net/instagram We suggest to join our chat groups to search players around your same region to play with!
